lexicalizations.lex: Barry Ferguson is the manager of Clyde F.C. which calls its ground, Broadwood Stadium. Alan Martin, a footballer for the Clyde FC club, used to play football for Hamilton Academical F.C.
Alan Martin has played football for Clyde F.C. and for Hamilton Academical F.C. Clyde F.C. are managed by Barry Ferguson and play at the Broadwood Stadium.
Alan Martin plays for Hamilton Academical FC and previously played for Broadwood Stadium based Clyde FC where Barry Ferguson is the manager.

Alan Martin is a footballer for the Hamilton Academical FC., the ground of which, is located in Hamilton, South Lanarkshire. Alan Martin is also a footballer for the Clyde FC club which is managed by, Barry Ferguson.
Alan Martin is a footballer for the Hamilton Academical FC whose home is in Hamilton, South Lanarkshire. Mr. Martin played for the Clyde FC that is managed by Mr. Barry Ferguson.
Alan Martin played football for Clyde F.C. and manager, Barry Ferguson. Mr. Martin also played for the Hamilton Academical FC whose home is in Hamilton, South Lanarkshire.

Alan Martin played for Clyde FC where Barry Ferguson is the manager. He now plays for Hamilton Academical FC based at New Douglas Park.

Alan Martin plays for Crewe Alexandra FC where the footballer Steve Davis is the manager, and also for Hamilton Academical FC who play at New Douglas Park.

The Broadwood Stadium is the home ground of Clyde F.C. which is managed by Barry Ferguson. Former Clyde F.C. footballer, Alan Martin, now is a member of the Motherwell FC.
